GSD.description:
crypto: octeontx2 - CN10K CPT to RNM workaround

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit c756b8a20176f5537b2604c9d917827f1a3834bc. For more details please see the references link.
